fulltext:
TRAN THI THU HIEN 
Date of birth: 03/01/1994 
Gender:  Female 
Phone:  0902543942 
Email:  tranhien7633@gmail.com 
Address: Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City 
EDUCATION 
09/2012 - 09/2016 
Ho Chi Minh City University of Law 
Major: Law 
Degree classification: Good 
Score: 7.38 
HONORS 
2015 - 2016 
Department's Scholarships for excellent students of Ho Chi Minh City University of Law 
2018  
Excellent staff of SaiGonXanh Construction and Interior Decoration Corporation  
WORK EXPERIENCE 
2015 – 2019 
Marketing Online Staff 
- Write and upload product advertising post via Facebook, Forum, Google, Web, .. 
- Advertising for products on Facebook, Google 
- Develop a short-term advertising plan 
12/2017 – 04/2019 
SaiGonXanh Construction and Interior Decoration Corporation 
- Negotiate terms and conditions that protect the best interest of SaiGonXanh. Negotiate liability terms, 
special stocking arrangements, and other agreements that are outside of standard SaiGonXanh terms 
and conditions. 
- Contract management. 
- Study/check bidding document/ proposal. 
- Participating in all bidding processes of the Company. 
- Plan and prepare bidding documents. 
- Advise the Executive Committee, Divisions/ Departments on legal implications of internal policies and 
procedures. 
- Perform a variety of tasks. A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected. 
2017 - 10/2017 
Manufacturing trade and services Thanh Loi CO.,LTD 
- Contract management. 
- Advise the Executive Committee, Divisions/ Departments on legal implications of internal policies and 
procedures. 
- Understand Business Units’ personnel requirements and pro-actively provide recruitment services for 
diverse positions, from high priority to manager or staff-level. 
- Manage company’s recruitment process. 
- Assist in processing product registration, advertising license, promotional activity license etc.  
- Perform other tasks assigned by Chief Executive Officer. 
SKILLS 
- Confident, outgoing and career orientated with good interpersonal and communication skills. 
- Positive, ‘can do’ attitude and able to work under pressure. 
- Hard working, open and willing to learn new things. 
- Honest, high-compliance mindset, high integrity, patient, detailed oriented. 
- Adapt to changes quickly. 
- Be able to interact and partner with various departments. 
- Be able to work independently or under less supervision. 
OBJECTIVES 
I am currently seeking a full time position in an environment that offers a greater challenge, increased 
benefits for my family, and the opportunity to help the company thrive and be effective
